afp package¶

Submodules¶

afp.count module¶

This module contains the functors which count the keywords in a set of articles, producing a matrix

class afp.count.WordCounter(keywordsToIndices)[source]¶

Bases: afp.count.WordCounterBase

Functor that counts all keywords in keywordsToIndices map in an article.

Returns: Sparse matrix of counts with articles on rows and words on columns from scipy.sparse.csr_matrix

Example usage:

>>> articles = retrieve.getCleanArticles( cleanersettings.CLEAN_STORE )
>>> keywordsToIndices = keywords.getKeywordToIndexMap( settings.KEYWORDS_FILEPATH )
>>> countMatrix = count.WordCounter( keywordsToIndices )( articles )
>>> countMatrix
(0, 7)     3
(0, 35)    2
(0, 48)    1
(1, 7)     2
...
getCounts(article)[source]¶
normalize = <module 'afp.normalize' from 'C:\Users\curly\git\AFP\afp\afp\normalize.pyc'>¶
class afp.count.WordCounterBase[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for WordCounter Functors

Extending Requires method: getCounts()

getCounts(article)[source]¶

Required to be a WordCounter, must be implemented in extending class.

afp.keywords module¶

This module handles the keyword mappings required when counting words in articles for matrix generation

afp.keywords.formatAlias(alias)[source]¶

Formats a string in Alias format

>>> formatAlias( 'A Particular Company' )
'a particular company'
afp.keywords.formatName(name)[source]¶

Formats a string in Name format

>>> formatName( r"someone's financial GROUP" )
'Someone's Financial Group'
afp.keywords.formatTicker(ticker)[source]¶

Formats a string in Ticker format

>>> formatTicker( 'boog' )
'BOOG'
afp.keywords.getAliasToKeywordMap(csvFile='C:\\Users\\curly\\Dropbox\\AFPdb\\Keywords/keywords.csv')[source]¶

Returns a dictionary with aliases as keys and keywords as values given keywords csvFile path

Parameters:csvFile – The path of the keywords .csv file
afp.keywords.getIndexToFieldsMap(csvFile='C:\\Users\\curly\\Dropbox\\AFPdb\\Keywords/keywords.csv')[source]¶

Returns a dictionary with indices as keys and fields as values given keywords csvFile path

Parameters:csvFile – The path of the keywords .csv file

Returns a dictionary with keywords as keys and fields as values given keywords csvFile path

Parameters:csvFile – The path of the keywords .csv file

Returns a sparse tf-idf Matrix

Parameters:
  • articles – An iterable of article strings. See cleaner.retrieve.getCleanArticles()
  • keywordMap – A mapping of keywords to their matrix column indices. See afp.keywords.getKeywordToIndexMap()

afp.normalize module¶

This module contains the functors which normalize all types of inputs, from matrices to articles, to an expected format.

class afp.normalize.Article[source]¶

Bases: afp.normalize.NormalizerBase

Functor normalizing articles to be searched for keywords

Replaces the following:

From To Example Result
‘’s’ ‘’ boogle’s boogle
‘n’t’ ‘ not’ didn’t did not
‘/’ ‘ or ‘ addle/boogle addle or boogle
normalize(article)[source]¶

Normalizes article to be outputed in iterable of words where each word has been replaced according to member: wordReplacements. Also forces all-lowercase.

wordReplacements = [("'s", ''), ("n't", ' not'), ('/', ' or ')]¶
class afp.normalize.NormalizerBase[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for Normalizing Functors

Extending Requires method: normalize()

normalize(matrix)[source]¶
class afp.normalize.TfIdf[source]¶

Bases: afp.normalize.NormalizerBase

Functor normalizing count matrices to tf-idf matrices

normalize(counts)[source]¶

Normalizes count matrix into tf-idf matrix

Parameters:counts – Counts of words in each article. Elements may be negative. Sign is passed-through.

Contains the constants and settings for the afp package.
